original_title: Court calls for an analytical report on Dinesh Schaffter’s laptop computer
original_body_lines: The Colombo Chief Magistrate today ordered the Government Analyst to submit in Court an analytical report pertaining to the laptop computers used by late businessman Dinesh Shafter and his family members, in order to facilitate for the ongoing investigations into Shafter's death.
Colombo Chief Magistrate Prasanna Alwis made this order pursuant to a request made by CID through a motion.

The panel comprises Prof. Asela Mendis, Prof. D.C.R. Perera, Prof. D.N.P. Fernando, Dr. Siva Subramaniam and Dr. Rohan Ruwanpura are currently examining and holding an inquiry to decide the actual cause of death for Dinesh Shafter.(Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
